text: Lorenzo Cherubini (born 27 September 1966), better known as Jovanotti is an Italian singer, songwriter, rapper, record producer and DJ. Jovanotti first sang a mix of hip hop, rap and disco. Then he included funk, world music and even classical music and ska. Most of his songs are sung in Italian. He has also made a Spanish language greatest hits album. == Biography == === Private life === Cherubini is the third of four brothers.Musicalnews.com: Jovanotti - Lorenzo Cherubini ospite Domenica 8 giugno dei giovani redattori di Screensaver su Rai Tre His oldest brother, Umberto was a flying instructor at Touchandgo School until his death in a plane crash on 22 October 2007. After that, Jovanotti composed In orbita and Fango as tribute. The second brother, Bernardo, is a showman. Jovanotti attended at Liceo Malpighi in Rome where he get a degree in science. === Career === Jovanotti's musical career began in 1988. Jovanotti for President was his first album. == Discography == * 1988 – Jovanotti for President * 1989 – La mia moto * 1990 – Giovani Jovanotti * 1991 – Una tribù che balla * 1992 – Lorenzo 1992 * 1994 – Lorenzo 1994 * 1997 – Lorenzo 1997 - L'albero * 1999 – Lorenzo 1999 - Capo Horn * 2002 – Lorenzo 2002 - Il quinto mondo * 2005 – Buon sangue * 2008 – Safari * 2011 – Ora * 2015 – Lorenzo 2015 CC. == References == == Other websites == * Sito ufficiale * Category:Italian singer-songwriters Category:21st-century Italian singers Category:21st-century Italian songwriters Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Musicians from Rome Category:Italian DJs Category:Italian rappers Category:Italian record producers
title: Jovanotti
